law.catch_line: Department to approve any acceptable housing for parolees.
law.text: When considering appropriate housing options for a person considered for parole or a person who is being paroled, the department shall approve any form of acceptable housing, including but not limited to apartments, shelters for homeless or other persons, county jails or restricted custody facilities that a county approves for parolees, educational institutions with dormitories if the parolee is enrolled or accepted for enrollment at an educational institution, halfway houses, residential treatment or other programs in which the parolee is enrolled or accepted for enrollment, and other forms of transitional housing meeting the requirements of applicable statutes.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 41, effective June 8, 2011.
